topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5439ec7b6368721800d90000#post_5439ec7b6368721800d90000

now you see this picture of hitler

!http://ais.badische-zeitung.de/piece/02/02/8a/18/33720856.jpg!

all fine and dandy, looking proud as always since he was a honorable guy.

BUT WAIT

!http://i.imgur.com/AmjZFGz.png!

weird symbol huh?

well doing some research i found the nazis used an almost symilar symbol.

!http://www.clker.com/cliparts/2/3/9/3/12428120201507004828War_Ensign_of_Germany_1935-1938.svg.med.png!

SOME MIGHT THINK ITS A CONSPIRACY THEORY.

BUT I CALL IT THE TRUTH

ALSO

hitler was in power from 1933 to 1945

the nazis existed from 1933 to 1945

COINCIDENCE?
